lyric:
[by:已过期i]
[00:00.000] 作曲 : Mark August Stoermer/Ronnie Jr. Vannucci/Dave Brent Keuning
[00:01.000] 作词 : Brandon Flowers
[00:08.986] Coming out of my cage and I've been doing just fine
[00:12.936] Gotta, gotta be down because I want it all
[00:16.811] It started out with a kiss, how did it end up like this?
[00:20.383] It was only a kiss, it was only a kiss
[00:24.421] Now I'm falling asleep and she's calling a cab
[00:28.058] While he's having a smoke and she's taking a drag
[00:32.136] Now they're going to bed and my stomach is sick
[00:35.858] And it's all in my head, but she's touching his chest now
[00:41.159] He takes off her dress now
[00:44.852] Let me go (Let me go)
[00:54.567] I just can't look, it's killing me and taking control
[01:06.535]
[01:09.400] Jealousy, turning saints into the sea
[01:15.246] Swimming through sick lullabies, choking on your alibis
[01:22.971] But it's just the price I pay, destiny is calling me
[01:30.706] Open up my eager eyes, 'cause I'm Mr. Brightside
[01:40.867]
[01:54.138] She's touching his chest now, he takes off her dress now
[02:01.245] Let me go (Let me go)
[02:08.428]
[02:10.762] I just can't look, it's killing me
[02:17.940] And taking control
[02:25.769] Jealousy, turning saints into the sea
[02:31.673] Swimming through sick lullabies, choking on your alibis
[02:39.223] But it's just the price I pay, destiny is calling me
[02:46.915] Open up my eager eyes, 'cause I'm Mr. Brightside
[02:57.237]
[03:08.114] 'Cause I'm Mr. Brightside
tlyric:
[by:虹烧虾的红烧鱼]
[00:08.986]我从牢笼中挣脱 一直以来都得以处理妥善
[00:12.936]要努力保持冷静 因为我我想得到全部信息
[00:16.811]事情起源于一吻 却以如此方式结束？
[00:20.383]都只是当初那一吻啊
[00:24.421]我正沉沉睡去 他却出门叫了辆出租车
[00:28.058]他抽着烟 而她在飞着叶子
[00:32.136]当下他们正准备同床共事 令人作呕
[00:35.858]这一切都印在了我脑海 她的双手已然抚上了他的胸口
[00:41.159]而她的裙子被他脱去
[00:44.852]放过我吧
[00:54.567]我实在看不下去了 这将我折磨得生不如死
[01:09.400]嫉妒 将圣人葬身海底
[01:15.246]在病态的摇篮中畅游 在你的说辞中窒息
[01:22.971]但这就是我的代价 也是命运对我做出的召唤
[01:30.706]睁开我渴望的双眼 因为我是乐天派先生
[01:54.138]她的双手已然抚上了他的胸口 而她的裙子被他脱去
[02:01.245]放过我吧
[02:10.762]我实在看不下去了 这让我生不如死
[02:17.940]将我折磨殆尽
[02:25.769]嫉妒 将圣人葬身海底
[02:31.673]在病态的摇篮中畅游 在你的说辞中窒息
[02:39.223]但这就是我的代价 也是命运对我做出的召唤
[02:46.915]睁开我渴望的双眼 因为我是乐天派先生
[03:08.114]因为我是 乐天派先生
